dev_card.eco_conference.description: Move the eco conference and steal 1 resource card from a player with an industrial estate adjacent to the new eco conference location.
dev_card.victory_point.description: This card is worth 1 victory point when revealed.
dev_card.highway_madness.description: Place 2 new highways as if you had just built them.
dev_card.trading_frenzy.description: Take any 3 resource cards from the bank.
dev_card.monopoly.description: Choose 1 resource. All other players must give you all their resource cards of that type.
